column4: does anyone know why when conky starts automatically on start-up, it disappears after a second or two but keeps running behind the desktop?
What have you set the own_window preference to in .conkyrc?
but if I start Conky manually it works fine
Could be something to do with the desktop being drawn after conky starts
hmmm... any way to change that?
Never had that problem myself but I've heard it happens
ok thanks, I'll try some more Google :)
In your sessions entry where you have conky set to autostart...
Trwoody86: Try putting in sleep 5 before the conky command
That will delay conky starting for 5 seconds
ok, I'll give it a shot, thx
also try changing own_window type to normal
